This is probably the first game in my long time gaming career of +/- 19 years of gaming, that is 1) so addictive, 2) and yet so tiring.

It makes me utter the all known words "Just one more map", but lets me end up like a zombie at 4 am in the morning looking like sh!t and staring at my screen.

The game is not only very well playable, it has such a rich challenge of intellectual quests to finish, combined with a perfectly designed GUI to make your own maps.

Thumbs up, 10/10

Portal 2 takes everything that was great about the original and expands upon it greatly. This was a game I really enjoyed when I was younger. Seeing the worn down Aperture was truly an incredible setting. Listening to Cave Johnson ramble on and hearing him slowly deteriorate along side the abandoned studio was so much fun. The way that Wheatly suddenly turns on you and tries to kill you towards the end of the story was brilliant and kept the story progressing alongside the increasingly difficult puzzles. Even if yohu don't enjoy single play puzzle games this game will still enthrall you through its genius, friendship breaking/ destroying co-op campaign. I recently played though this campaign with a friend of mine and beat it all in one sitting. The physics are perfect, the setting is mysterious and enthralling. Definitely recommend. 9/10
Bro this is the game

Одна из лучших игр от вольво, на равне с Half-Life(хоть он мне и не особо зашёл). Сюжет хорошо переплетается с простым выполнением "тестов"(головоломок), что не даёт тебе заскучать от однообразия. Кооператив предоставляет более трудные головоломки, т.к. там уже две пары портал-пушек. Если честно, в одиночке большинство головломок нетрудные для взрослого человека, но она вывозит засчёт сюжета. В кооперативе же, сюжет отходит на второй план но благодаря усложненности головоломок и наличии напарника она также достойна внимания.

Eu joguei o Portal 1 e em sequência joguei o 2 e achei uma lindeza q só
A história é muito boa, tem uns plots ótimos tbm, e quando você se aprofunda na história é simplismente INCRÍVEL!
A jogabilidade melhorou até bastante e oque no 1 dava apenas umas 2/3 horas de gameplay, a Valve compensou bastante com 7/8 horas, ainda mais com o modo Co-op, que certamente pode render muito mais horas e é muito divertido.
非常棒的游戏，强烈推荐
